lead_paragraph: Leicester City failed to grasp their first chance to clinch the Premier League title when they drew 1-1 at Manchester United on Sunday but they moved ever closer to a first English top-flight crown.

headline.print_headline: Leicester Champagne on Ice, City Crash at Southampton
headline.main: Leicester Champagne on Ice, City Crash at Southampton
